remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的事件模型[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]根據具有與其處理常式連接事件的事件委派。The event model in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] is based on having an event delegate that connects an event with its handler. 引發事件時，需要兩個項目：To raise a event, two elements are needed: - 類別、 衍生自，其中保留的事件資料。The class, derived from , which holds the event data. - 委派，它會指向提供為了回應事件的方法。The delegate, which points to a method that provides the response to the event. 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
